items.title: Scalable Synthesis of Magnetic Nanoparticles
items.summary: Scalable and reproducible synthesis methods for magnetic nanoparticles.

items.title: Tuning Magnetic Properties Through Nanoparticle Shape Engineering and Assembly
items.summary: How nanoparticle shape and programmed assembly enable emergent collective magnetic properties.

items.title: Emerging Lines: MXenes & Multifunctional Nanoparticles
items.summary: Our research focuses on the design and engineering of hybrid nanomaterials that combine multiple components through conjugation or form single nano-objects with distinct chemical domains.

items.title: Field-Guided Magnetic Nanoparticle Superstructures
items.summary: Reconfigurable superstructures via dipolar coupling and field-guided assembly of magnetic nanoparticles.
